channel.title: Help me with my CLIENT.JAVA PLEASE
channel.description:
Hey people im having trouble with my client.java this is all i have in it...
@echo off @color 1f title Server compiler echo Starting YOURSERVERscape "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09injava.exe" server pause
is this normal becuase i try to put in certain things from the tut's list and i cant due to it not having files...
thanks plz post if theres anything iv done wrong

item.title: Help me with my CLIENT.JAVA PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @brettlee brettlee
item.description:
@brettlee wrote:

Hey people im having trouble with my client.java this is all i have in it…

@echo off
@color 1f
title Server compiler
echo Starting YOURSERVERscape
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

is this normal becuase i try to put in certain things from the tut’s list and i cant due to it not having files…

thanks plz post if theres anything iv done wrong
